course_title: Dissertation Workshop I: Macroeconomics Dir. Reading
course_description: The Dissertation Workshop meets weekly in the fall and spring semesters. Students and faculty read, hear, and discuss critically work in progress prepared by themselves and visiting scholars.
sections: Class Nbr: 5244, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 9:40-10:55a, Instructor: J. Rubio Ramirez, Status: Open
